sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import glamorous from 'glamorous'; function Nav() { const links = { textDecoration: 'none' } const subNav = { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'flex-end', alignItems: 'center', height: '18px', background: 'rgb(55,54,54)', color: 'white', } const subNavLink = { color: '#fff', fontSize: '80%', fontWeight: 100, width: '130px', } const nav = { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-around', alignItems: 'center', height: '6vw', maxHeight: '70px', minHeight: '40px', // background: 'linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(21,28,41,1) 50%, rgba(37,50,73,1) 100%)', background: 'linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(0,0,0,1) 11%, rgba(33,33,33,1) 81%)', } const navLogo = { height: '5vw', maxHeight: '65px', padding: '2px 0 2px 0', } const navLinks = { width: '80%', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', listStyle: 'none', padding: '0 10vw', } const LinkText = glamorous.li({ color: '#fff', fontWeight: 300, fontSize: '1.3vw', letterSpacing: '3px', textDecoration: 'none', padding: '10px', borderRadius: '30px', ':hover' : { color: '#FFF', backgroundColor: 'rgba(200,200,200, .3)', textShadow: '4px 4px #000', } }) return ( <>
Employee Portal Contact Us
    HOME ABOUT SERVICES OUR PROJECTS CONTACT
); } export default Nav;
